snippet: Polish prosecutors plan to charge a railway signal controller for unintentionally causing a head-on collision between two trains that killed 16 people on Saturday.
abstract: Polish prosecutors plan to charge a railway signal controller for unintentionally causing a head-on collision between two trains that killed 16 people after one was accidentally sent into the other's path.
lead_paragraph: Polish prosecutors plan to charge a railway signal controller for unintentionally causing a head-on collision between two trains that killed 16 people on Saturday.

headline.seo: Poland: Rail Worker to Be Charged in Crash
headline.main: Poland: Rail Worker to Be Charged in Crash
headline.print_headline: Poland: Rail Worker to Be Charged
